job_description:
" Experience in developing Amazon Connect contact flows, Using Dynamo DB, Create Lex Bots, API Gateway required

Must have experience in with designing and implementing call routing using routing profiles, queues, call backs, emergency messages, hours of operations, holiday routing with dynamic messaging

Strong programming skills in Python or Node.js to develop AWS Lambda functions

Experience or Awareness of AWS services like Contact Lens, Transcribe, Comprehend, S3, Athena, Quick Sight, Lambda, Elastic Search, Kibana and Kinesis preferred and usage

Contact center experience

Good to have experience with development and version control tools like Eclipse IDE, GIT, GitHub, TFS etc.

Experience with CI/CD pipelines using GoCD, Terraform and Cloud Formation is preferred

Should have good communication and analytical skills with ability to coordinate development with onshore/offshore developers as well as Line of Business customers

Strong Debugging, Troubleshooting, And Problem-solving Skills Required

AWS certification preferred"
